items.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued for Northern Colorado
items.areaDesc: Fort Collins, CO; Greeley, CO; Loveland, CO
items.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. Heavy snow and blowing snow will create dangerous travel conditions.
items.description: A winter storm will bring 6 to 12 inches of snow to the area through Friday morning.

items.headline: Heat Advisory issued for Phoenix Metro Area
items.areaDesc: Phoenix, AZ; Scottsdale, AZ; Tempe, AZ
items.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in air-conditioned rooms, and avoid extended exposure to the sun.
items.description: Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 115Â°F expected today.

items.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued for South Texas
items.areaDesc: San Antonio, TX; Austin, TX; Houston, TX
items.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize flood dangers.
items.description: Heavy rainfall may cause flash flooding in urban areas and small streams.
